abstract: Advice for a spouse on putting up with off-the-menu requests; for a cook whose dinner-party invitations aren't answered; and a weekend host wondering when houseguests will finally leave.
snippet: Advice for a spouse on putting up with off-the-menu requests; for a cook whose dinner-party invitations aren't answered; and a weekend host wondering when houseguests will finally leave.

headline.main: Dear FloFab: How Soon Can I Say Goodbye to Weekend Guests?
